name: New Classic Super Mario World HD
name_original: New Classic Super Mario World HD
description:
Welcome to New Classic Super Mario World HD (for the original fans)

(FROM SCRATCH) -7000+ Views and round 300+ favs and 300+ luvs and over 39+ remixes, THX SO MUCH!

-Original Version: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/103663284/ by: @G00_Station_Portable (@IsmaelGamer00)

-Controls are in the settings in the menu

-to start a level, you press space

-Every level is possible

____

NOTE: I converted it from a Scratch project to an app, thus some lagging and stuff are going to happen, as the full Scratch game engine is imported in the game.

To load the game, open nw.exe.
